about_the_game:
"War Mechanic" is a unique first-person game that casts you behind the front lines as a military base manager. Respond to frontline orders, and service vehicles, defend the base from enemy attacks, shoot down enemy planes, and salvage valuable resources from wrecks. Embrace the future by automating your work with robots. Expand your infrastructure and profit from the war industry. Explore the land's secrets with your combat vehicle, survive, and conquer other bases to expand your territory and dominance.

MASTER RESOURCE MANAGEMENT FOR BASE EXPANSION

Gather resources using an incredible blaster tool. Decide how to allocate them wisely as you expand and upgrade your base. Your success in the game depends on how effectively you manage your base, contracts, and resources. 

UNCOVER SECRETS AND OVERCOME CHALLENGES

Explore various abandoned bases and uncover their secrets. Discover new territories and survive the challenges that await you. "Uncover, Adapt, Overcome."

UPGRADE YOUR VEHICLE FOR ADVENTURE AND SAFETY

Invest in your vehicle’s development to ensure safe travel across unknown territories. Collect unique parts and resources to enhance your ride, prepare yourself for an unforgettable journey. "Craft Your Journey, One Part at a Time."

EVERY ACTION IS CRUCIAL FOR THE SUCCESS OF YOUR BASE

Take orders from the front line and maintain vehicles. Take advantage of the incredible achievements of our times and let robots do the job for you. This way, you’ll have more time to explore the island. "Let Machines Handle the Grind."

MONEY IS POWER

In this world, money is everything. You need to earn to expand your base, purchase, upgrade weapons, and improve infrastructure. Fulfill military contracts, operate on the black market, and trade to build your fortune.

THE ENEMY NEVER SLEEP

Be prepared for air raids and attacks that can come from any direction. Protect your investments and base from the enemy. Experience the excitement of firing anti-aircraft guns to fend off enemy assaults. Annihilate enemy units and melt down the scrap you gather for metal. “Repel the Onslaught.”

War Campaign & Economy

Engage in an epic war campaign. Each mission presents new challenges and rewards, bringing you closer to ultimate victory. Manage resources wisely to thrive and survive. Utilize the black market, gamble, and demonstrate your cunning in the ruthless capitalist world of war.

Humorous Dialogues and Interesting Characters

There's nothing more engaging than a well-written story. Enjoy sharp dialogues and meet intriguing characters (“Crazy Man”, “Wild Bull”) as you progress through the game.

  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 12

  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: War never sleeps—so why should you? As the owner of a deserted military repair base, your mission is clear: automate, expand, and turn war into profit. Secure government contracts, make ruthless business decisions and navigate the chaos of a privatized war economy!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
